extraData: TARGET feywild:winter_pixie ACTION use TIMES 16 USING minecraft:snowball
name: Setting up defences
text: Greetings mortal...Your arrival is as expected./nAs protection in the vicinity was severely lacking,/nI had to take it upon myself to summon souls to protect the base./nSigh.....such waste of time and magic./nAnd now their frozen bodies are collapsing,/nEither you g&provide me with more g&snow,/nor we can die a horrible death by a hungry zombie horde.../nEither way is fine by me...
